website_summaries.verdict: Showcasing a funky and retro style, the Globe Tilt is packed with plenty of urban cool. For $65, the shoe delivers a stylish skate look in plenty of fresh colorways. Reviewers praise it for its ultra-comfortable feel, along with its supportive and ideal fit.The sneaker's striking look is a signature approach of Globe lifestyle sneakers, taking inspiration from past designs for a creative modern perspective. Although the model is said to be stiff and bulky, skaters and casual wearers alike may find the vintage vibes irresistible.
pros: The Globe Tilt is a budget-friendly shoe, which a few users like
Most commenters remark that the sneaker is stylish and unique
A lot of users praise the shoe for its comfortable feel, which they describe as like walking on clouds
According to several wearers, the Globe Tilt offers a perfect fit
The sneaker is durable and can take a beating, some reviewers reveal
It has excellent support, more than a handful of purchasers have noted
Plenty of colorways are offered for the Globe Tilt
cons: A few buyers grumble that the sneaker is stiff and takes some time to break in
It's a bit bulky, a couple of users have complained

customer_reviews.title: Like cushions for the feet
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable shoes with wide sides if you have a bit of a flatter/ wider foot. Sides are very heavily padded and the sole itself is nice amd soft while adding good outside protection. Not used for skateboarding. Just general shoes so can't comment on the wear and tear from the deck on the shoe. Nice colour, and easy to clean with a cloth
customer_reviews.author: Russell Parker

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's happy
customer_reviews.text: My husband is particular about his shoes, he'll only wear skate shoes and only a specific type. These for the bill and are super comfy. He did get a blister but that's because he took no breaking in precautions before wearing them for a 3 mile round trip. All settled now and they're beautiful just like the image.
customer_reviews.author: L. V. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size Delivered
customer_reviews.text: The shoes as a product seem great, the problem is with the warehouse/dispatch. I ordered these shoes in a size UK 11, however I was delivered a size US 11 (Which is a UK 10) So too small and basically making the product useless to me. Really rather annoying now having to go through the process of making a return and ordering another pair because of such a basic error. I just hope I receive the correct size this time and can leave a more positive review.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect UK10 fit cool design and very durable been wearing Globe shoes for 15 years still very happy with quality.
